posts.post_content:
Um, I...I don't even know where to start here. I mean, do you have any idea who you're talking to? Do you have any idea, any idea who I am? Basically, kind of a big deal.  
  
Okay...grass grows, birds fly, sun shines, and brother...I hurt people during their upkeep.

posts.post_content:
I wish they had kept the Force creature type for all of the primal-manifestation-of-nature green creatures, instead of making them Elementals. What element does this guy (or any of the other green elementals) represent?  
  
And the drawback could actually be a benefit, if you had multiple [Spirit Link](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Spirit Link)s or similar on him.

posts.post_content:
\*sigh\*
  
   
Oh, Force of Nature, time has not been kind to you. Once, you were the scariest of all creatures, crushing everything as an 8/8 monster. Nothing could stop you! And then the years passed, and creature got better. Now, you're vastly outclassed by a funny-looking mole-thing called a Terra Stomper, but we old-timers will always remember how amazing you once were.
